tutorial.createNewMockup: Start by creating a new mockup
tutorial.surpriseMe: Click 'Surprise Me' for instant inspiration, or customize with categories and tags
tutorial.categoriesHint: You can also configure by selecting categories and tags
tutorial.title: How to Use Mockup Machine¬Æ
tutorial.subtitle: Quick user journey guide

step1.title: 1. Start your project
step1.description: Upload an image of your design. You can drag & drop or paste an image directly.

step2.title: 2. Choose your model
step2.description: Select between Mockup Machine¬Æ HD (fast, 1 credit) or Mockup Machine¬Æ 4K (high quality, 3-7 credits).

step3.title: 3. Define design type
step3.description: Choose if it's a standalone logo or a full layout / design. This helps us better understand your project.

step4.title: 4. Describe your brand's personality
step4.description: Describe your brand's personality (e.g., minimalist, modern, luxury). Or add a custom style.

step5.title: 5. Choose the Mockup category
step5.description: Select where your design will be applied (e.g., business card, packaging, t-shirt). AI can also suggest categories based on your design.

step6.title: 6. Refine with advanced options (optional)
step6.description: Customize color palette, location, camera angle, lighting, and visual effects. Add negative and additional prompts for more control.

step7.title: 7. Configure output
step7.description: Set the number of images, aspect ratio (auto for HD), and options like contextual text or human interaction.

step8.title: 8. Generate prompt
step8.description: Click 'GENERATE PROMPT' to let AI create an optimized description of your mockup, or write your own prompt.

step9.title: 9. Generate results
step9.description: Review the generated prompt, adjust if needed, and click 'GENERATE OUTPUTS' to create your professional mockups.

tutorial.tip: üí° Tip: Use 'Me Surpreenda!' to get instant inspiration!

newStep1.description: Send your logo or layout art

newStep3.description: Create your perfect mockup, configuring lighting, environment, colors and visual aspects to achieve accurate results.

newStep4.description: Press the button to like the best results and download to not lose the generations.

videoStep.description: Watch the tutorial video to get started with Mockup Machine¬Æ

privacy.title: Privacy Policy ‚Äî Visant Labs Mockup Machine
privacy.overview: Visant Labs is committed to protecting your privacy. This Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when using the Mockup Machine, our AI-powered image generation and editing platform.

accountInfo.title: 1.1 Account Information
items: Name
Email address
User ID
Profile picture (when provided)
Authentication data via providers (Google/Apple/Email)

paymentInfo.title: 1.2 Payment Information
items: Subscription data (active plan, renewals, history)
Billing identifiers via third-party providers (Pagar.me, PagSeguro, Stripe, or others)
We never store complete card data.

usageData.title: 1.3 Usage Data
items: Number of images generated
Prompts submitted by users
Platform usage time
Error logs for maintenance

technicalData.title: 1.4 Technical Data
items: IP address
Device type
Browser
Language preferences

googleAuth.title: 1.5 Google Authentication Data
googleAuth.permissionsIntro: When you choose to sign in with Google, we request the following permissions (OAuth 2.0 scopes):
permissions: email ‚Äî Access to your Google account email address
profile ‚Äî Access to your basic profile information
googleAuth.dataIntro: The specific data we collect from your Google account includes:
dataItems: Email address ‚Äî Used as your primary account identifier
Full name ‚Äî Used to personalize your profile
Profile picture ‚Äî Used as your account avatar (optional)
Google User ID (sub) ‚Äî Used for authentication and account linking
googleAuth.important: Important: We do not access your Google contacts, calendar, drive files, or any other Google services beyond the basic profile information listed above.

apiKeys.title: 1.6 API Keys
apiKeys.intro: If you choose to use your own Gemini API key with our service, we collect and store:
items: Your encrypted Gemini API key ‚Äî Stored securely using AES-256-GCM encryption
API key metadata ‚Äî Associated with your account for usage tracking
apiKeys.important: Important: Providing your own API key is completely optional. If you choose to provide one, it will be encrypted immediately upon saving and never stored in plaintext.

howWeUseData.title: 2. HOW WE USE YOUR DATA
items: Operate and improve the Mockup Machine
Process subscriptions and payments
Monitor plan usage limits
Personalize your experience
Prevent abusive or fraudulent use
Comply with legal obligations

googleAuth.title: 2.1 Use of Google Authentication Data
googleAuth.intro: We use the data collected from your Google account exclusively for:
items: Creating and managing your Mockup Machine account
Authenticating your identity when you sign in
Linking your Google account to your existing account (if applicable)
Pre-filling your profile information (name and profile picture)
Preventing duplicate accounts and fraudulent activity
googleAuth.note: We do not use your Google data for advertising, marketing, or any purpose other than account management and authentication. Your Google credentials are never stored by us; we only store the profile information provided by Google's OAuth service.

aiTraining.title: 2.2 Use for AI Training
aiTraining.note: Prompts and generated images are not used to train Visant Labs' internal models, unless you provide explicit consent.

apiKeys.title: 2.3 Use of API Keys
apiKeys.intro: If you provide your own Gemini API key, we use it exclusively for:
items: Processing your AI image generation requests
Using your Google Cloud quota and credits instead of our system's default key
Prioritizing your key over the default key for your account's requests
apiKeys.important: Important: We never use your API key for any purpose other than processing your requests. All API calls made with your key are billed to your Google Cloud account, not ours. We never share your API keys with third parties or use them for any other purpose.

serviceProviders.title: 3.1 Service Providers
items: Third-party AI image generation APIs
Payment providers
Hosting and storage services
Authentication services (MongoDBAuth)
Analytics services (Google Analytics) ‚Äî for website usage statistics only
serviceProviders.note: We share only the minimum necessary for service operation. Analytics data shared with Google Analytics is anonymized and does not include personally identifiable information.

googleData.title: 3.2 Google Data Sharing
googleData.intro: We do not share your Google account data with any third parties. The data we collect from Google (email, name, profile picture, and Google User ID) is:
items: Stored securely in our own database
Used exclusively for authentication and account management
Not sold, rented, or shared with advertisers or marketing partners
Not used for any purpose beyond what is necessary to operate the Mockup Machine service
googleData.exception: The only exception is when required by law enforcement or court order (see section 3.3).

legalObligations.title: 3.3 Legal Obligations
legalObligations.note: We may disclose information (including Google authentication data) if required by law or court order.

apiKeySharing.title: 3.4 API Key Sharing
apiKeySharing.intro: We do not share your API keys with any third parties. Your API keys are:
items: Stored securely in our encrypted database
Used exclusively for processing your requests
Never sold, rented, or shared with advertisers, marketing partners, or service providers
Never exposed in API responses, logs, or any other output
Only decrypted in memory when needed for API calls, then immediately discarded
apiKeySharing.exception: The only exception is when required by law enforcement or court order (see section 3.3).

storageAndSecurity.title: 4. STORAGE AND SECURITY
storageAndSecurity.intro: All data, including Google authentication data, is protected using industry-standard security measures:
items: Your data is stored on secure servers with encryption at rest and in transit.
We use MongoDB, DigitalOcean, and Vercel as our primary infrastructure.
We apply reinforced authentication, RLS, and security best practices.
OAuth tokens are handled securely and never stored in plain text.
All database connections use encrypted channels (TLS/SSL).

googleAuth.title: 4.1 Google Authentication Security
items: We use OAuth 2.0, the industry-standard authentication protocol.
Google access tokens are never stored in our database.
We only store the Google User ID (sub) and profile information provided by Google after successful authentication.
Your Google password is never accessible to us and remains secure with Google.
You can revoke our access to your Google account at any time through your Google account settings.

apiKeySecurity.title: 4.2 API Key Security
apiKeySecurity.intro: We implement military-grade security measures to protect your API keys:
items: Encryption: We use AES-256-GCM encryption, a military-grade encryption standard, to encrypt your API keys before storage
Master Key: Encryption keys are stored securely in environment variables, never in code or version control
No Plaintext Storage: Your API key is never stored in plaintext in our database, logs, or anywhere else
In-Memory Decryption: API keys are only decrypted in memory when needed for API calls, then immediately discarded
User Isolation: Each user can only access their own encrypted API key
Authentication Required: Only authenticated users can save or access their own API keys
No Exposure: We never return decrypted API keys in API responses ‚Äî we only confirm successful operations
Audit Trail: API key operations (save/delete) are logged for security auditing
apiKeySecurity.responsibilities: Your Responsibilities: Keep your API key secure, never share it with others, and consider rotating it periodically. Monitor your Google Cloud Console for unexpected usage or charges. Configure API key restrictions in Google AI Studio to limit where it can be used.

yourRights.title: 5. YOUR RIGHTS
items: Access your data
Correct information
Request account deletion
Export your data
Revoke consents
yourRights.contact: To exercise your rights, contact Visant Labs support.

cookiesAndTracking.title: 6. COOKIES AND TRACKING TECHNOLOGIES
items: Authentication
Interface preferences
Internal metrics

googleAnalytics.title: 6.1 Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.intro: We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors interact with our website. Google Analytics collects:
googleAnalytics.howItWorks: Google Analytics uses cookies and similar technologies. The data collected is processed by Google according to their Privacy Policy. You can:
options: Opt out of Google Analytics by installing the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on
Manage cookie preferences through your browser settings
Use browser extensions that block tracking
googleAnalytics.note: We do not send personally identifiable information (PII) to Google Analytics. We have configured Google Analytics to respect user privacy and comply with data protection regulations.

cookiesAndTracking.noAdvertising: We do not use advertising cookies or tracking pixels for marketing purposes.

general.title: 7.1 General Data Retention
items: Account data is retained while your subscription is active.
Logs and metrics may be retained for up to 12 months.
Data may be anonymized for internal analysis.

googleAuth.title: 7.2 Google Authentication Data Retention
googleAuth.intro: Google authentication data (email, name, profile picture, Google User ID) is retained:
items: While your Mockup Machine account is active
For up to 90 days after account deletion (for security and fraud prevention purposes)
As required by law or legal obligations

apiKeys.title: 7.3 API Key Data Retention
apiKeys.intro: Your encrypted API keys are retained:
items: While your Mockup Machine account is active and you choose to use your own API key
Until you explicitly delete your API key from our system
Permanently removed immediately upon deletion ‚Äî no retention period

requestingDeletion.title: 7.4 Requesting Data Deletion
requestingDeletion.intro: You have the right to request deletion of your data, including Google authentication data and API keys:
items: You can delete your API key directly through the Mockup Machine settings at any time
You can delete your account directly through the Mockup Machine settings
Contact us at contato@visant.co to request immediate deletion
Upon API key deletion, your encrypted key is permanently removed from our systems immediately
Upon account deletion, your Google User ID and associated profile data will be permanently removed from our systems
To revoke Google OAuth access, visit your Google Account settings at myaccount.google.com/permissions
requestingDeletion.note: Note: Some data may be retained for up to 90 days after deletion for security, fraud prevention, or legal compliance purposes, but will not be used for any other purpose during this period. API keys are an exception and are deleted immediately with no retention period.

changesToPolicy.title: 8. CHANGES TO THIS POLICY
changesToPolicy.note: We may update this policy periodically. Substantial changes will be communicated via email or within the application.

sections.agreement: By using the Mockup Machine, you agree to this Privacy Policy.

terms.title: Terms of Service ‚Äî Visant Labs Mockup Machine
terms.overview: Welcome to Mockup Machine, an AI-powered image generation and editing platform operated by Visant Labs. By accessing or using our service, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account, accessing, or using the Mockup Machine, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree to these terms, you may not use our service.

description.title: 2. Description of Service
description.intro: Mockup Machine is a platform that allows users to:
items: Generate photorealistic mockups using AI technology
Upload and apply designs to various mockup templates
Customize mockups with branding, location, lighting, and other parameters
Export generated images for personal or commercial use

accountCreation.title: 3.1 Account Creation
accountCreation.intro: To use certain features of the service, you must create an account. You agree to:
items: Provide accurate, current, and complete information
Maintain and update your account information
Maintain the security of your account credentials
Accept responsibility for all activities under your account

accountTermination.title: 3.2 Account Termination
accountTermination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violation of these terms, fraudulent activity, or any other reason we deem necessary to protect our service and users.

freeTier.title: 4.1 Free Tier
freeTier.content: We offer a limited free tier with a restricted number of image generations. Free tier limitations may change at any time.

paidSubscriptions.title: 4.2 Paid Subscriptions
items: Subscriptions are billed on a recurring basis (monthly or annually)
All fees are non-refundable except as required by law
Prices may change with 30 days' notice to existing subscribers
You may cancel your subscription at any time
Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period

paymentProcessing.title: 4.3 Payment Processing
paymentProcessing.content: Payments are processed through third-party providers (Stripe, Pagar.me, PagSeguro, or others). You agree to their terms and conditions. We do not store complete payment card information.

acceptableUse.title: 5. Acceptable Use
items: Use the service for any illegal purpose or in violation of any laws
Generate content that is defamatory, harmful, abusive, or violates others' rights
Upload content that infringes on intellectual property rights
Attempt to reverse engineer, decompile, or extract the source code
Use automated systems (bots, scrapers) to access the service
Share your account credentials with others
Interfere with or disrupt the service or servers
Generate content that promotes hate speech, violence, or illegal activities

yourContent.title: 6.1 Your Content
yourContent.intro: You retain ownership of designs and content you upload. By using the service, you grant us a license to:
items: Process and store your content to provide the service
Generate mockups based on your content
Use your content for service improvement (with your explicit consent)

generatedImages.title: 6.2 Generated Images
generatedImages.intro: You own the mockup images generated through the service. You may use them for:
items: Personal projects
Commercial projects
Client work
Marketing and promotional materials
generatedImages.restriction: However, you may not resell the mockup images as standalone products or use them to train competing AI models.

ourService.title: 6.3 Our Service
ourService.content: The Mockup Machine platform, including its design, functionality, and underlying technology, is owned by Visant Labs and protected by intellectual property laws.

serviceAvailability.title: 7. Service Availability
serviceAvailability.intro: We strive to maintain high availability but do not guarantee:
items: Uninterrupted or error-free service
Specific response times or generation speeds
Availability of all features at all times
serviceAvailability.maintenance: We may perform maintenance, updates, or modifications that temporarily affect service availability. We will provide reasonable notice when possible.

rateLimits.title: 8. Rate Limits and Usage
rateLimits.intro: To ensure fair access and service quality:
items: We implement rate limits based on your subscription tier
Free tier users have limited generations per period
Excessive usage may result in temporary restrictions
We reserve the right to modify limits with notice

asIs.title: 9.1 Service "As Is"
asIs.content: The service is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement.

aiGenerated.title: 9.2 AI-Generated Content
aiGenerated.content: AI-generated content may contain errors, inaccuracies, or unexpected results. We do not guarantee the accuracy, quality, or suitability of generated images for any specific purpose.

limitation.title: 9.3 Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Visant Labs shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.

indemnification.title: 10. Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Visant Labs, its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses (including legal fees) arising out of or relating to your use of the service, violation of these terms, or infringement of any rights of another.

modifications.title: 11. Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Material changes will be communicated via email or within the application. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified terms.

termination.title: 12. Termination
termination.intro: Either party may terminate this agreement:
items: You may cancel your account at any time
We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms
Upon termination, your right to use the service immediately ceases
We may delete your account data in accordance with our Privacy Policy

governingLaw.title: 13. Governing Law
governingLaw.content: These Terms of Service shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws. Any disputes arising from these terms or your use of the service shall be resolved through appropriate legal channels.

sections.agreement: By using the Mockup Machine, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

refund.title: Refund Policy ‚Äî Visant Labs Mockup Machine
refund.overview: This Refund Policy is in compliance with the Consumer Defense Code (CDC - Law No. 8.078/1990) and establishes the procedures for requesting refunds for subscriptions and credits purchased on the Mockup Machine platform, operated by Visant Labs.

rightOfWithdrawal.title: 1. Right of Withdrawal
rightOfWithdrawal.content: According to Article 49 of the Consumer Defense Code, you have the right to withdraw from the purchase of a subscription or credits within 7 (seven) calendar days counted from the date of purchase confirmation, without the need for justification.
rightOfWithdrawal.applicable: This right applies to both monthly/annual subscriptions and individual credits purchased on our platform.

howToRequest.title: 2.1 How to Request
howToRequest.intro: To exercise your right of withdrawal and request a refund, you must:
items: Send an email to contato@visant.co within the 7 calendar day period
Inform the transaction number or purchase identification
Indicate the reason for the request (not mandatory, but helps us improve our services)
Provide bank account or payment account details for refund, when applicable

processing.title: 2.2 Processing
processing.content: After receiving your request, we will analyze your request and respond within 2 (two) business days. The refund will be processed according to the payment method used in the original purchase.

partial.title: 3.1 Partial Refund
partial.intro: For monthly or annual subscriptions canceled within the 7-day period:
items: The refund will be calculated proportionally to the unused period
Credits used during the period will not be refunded
The refund will be credited according to the original payment method

full.title: 3.2 Full Refund
full.content: If no credits were used since the purchase, you will be entitled to a full refund of the subscription.

unused.title: 4.1 Unused Credits
unused.content: Credits purchased and not used can be fully refunded within the 7-day withdrawal period.

partiallyUsed.title: 4.2 Partially Used Credits
partiallyUsed.content: If you used part of the purchased credits, the refund will be calculated only on the value of unused credits.

processingTimes.title: 5. Processing Times for Refund
processingTimes.intro: After approval of the request, processing times vary according to the payment method:
items: Credit Card: The chargeback will appear on the next or subsequent invoice, depending on the card issuer (average time: 5 to 15 business days)
PIX: Refund processed within 1 (one) business day
Bank Slip: Refund processed via bank transfer within 5 (five) business days after confirmation
Debit Card: Refund processed within 3 (three) business days

technicalIssues.title: 6.1 Technical Issues
technicalIssues.content: If technical problems occur that prevent adequate use of the services, and these problems persist for more than 48 hours, you may request a refund even after the 7-day period, provided the problem was reported immediately.

purchaseError.title: 6.2 Purchase Error
purchaseError.content: In case of purchase error (incorrect amount, wrong product, duplication), the refund will be processed immediately, regardless of the 7-day period.

exceptions.title: 7. Exceptions
exceptions.intro: The right of withdrawal does not apply in the following cases:
items: Credits or subscriptions purchased as gifts/promotions
Products or services personalized or customized specifically for you
When the service was fully provided and consumed by the customer

cancellation.title: 8. Subscription Cancellation
cancellation.content: You can cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings. The cancellation will take effect at the end of the current paid period, and you will continue to have access to services until that date.
cancellation.refundNote: If cancellation occurs within the 7-day withdrawal period, the refund rules described in this policy apply.

contact.title: 9. Contact and Support
contact.intro: To request a refund, ask questions, or report problems, contact us:
contact.responseTime: Response Time: Up to 2 (two) business days

changes.title: 10. Changes to this Policy
changes.content: We reserve the right to update this Refund Policy periodically. Significant changes will be communicated by email or through a notice on our platform. The updated version will always be available on this page with the last update date.

sections.legalNote: Legal Note: This policy is in compliance with the Brazilian Consumer Defense Code (Law No. 8.078/1990) and does not limit the rights guaranteed by law. If you have questions about your rights as a consumer, we recommend consulting the PROCON in your region or a lawyer specialized in Consumer Law.

usage.title: Usage Policy ‚Äî Visant Labs Mockup Machine
usage.overview: This Usage Policy discloses the AI technology and services used by Mockup Machine to provide image generation capabilities. By using our service, you acknowledge that you understand and agree to these technical details.

aiTechnology.title: 1. AI Technology Disclosure
aiTechnology.intro: Mockup Machine utilizes Google's Gemini AI models for image generation. The service provides two distinct quality tiers, each powered by different Google Gemini models:

hd.name: Mockup Machine¬Æ HD
features: Lower resolution output suitable for most use cases

4k.name: Mockup Machine¬Æ 4K
4k.model: Powered by Google Gemini 3 Pro Preview

serviceProvider.title: 2. Service Provider
serviceProvider.intro: The AI image generation capabilities are provided through:
items: Google Cloud AI / Google AI ‚Äî Provider of Gemini AI models
API access to Google Gemini 2.5 Flash for HD generation
API access to Google Gemini 3 Pro Preview for 4K generation
All image generation requests are processed by Google's servers
serviceProvider.note: Mockup Machine acts as an intermediary service that interfaces with Google's AI models to provide you with image generation capabilities. Your use of Mockup Machine is also subject to Google's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy for their AI services.

resolution.title: 3.1 Resolution and Quality
items: Mockup Machine¬Æ HD: Fixed resolution optimized for speed and efficiency
Mockup Machine¬Æ 4K: Configurable resolution options (1K, 2K, 4K)
Higher resolutions consume more credits and may take longer to generate
Actual output quality depends on input parameters and model capabilities

processingTimes.title: 3.2 Processing Times
items: HD generation typically completes in seconds
4K generation may take significantly longer, especially at higher resolutions
Processing times are dependent on Google's API availability and load
No guaranteed response times ‚Äî service availability is subject to third-party API status

features.title: 3.3 Feature Differences
items: HD model supports automatic aspect ratio based on input image
4K model supports manual aspect ratio selection and multiple reference images
Both models support the same prompt customization options
Advanced features may only be available on the 4K model

dataUsage.title: 4. Data Usage and Privacy
dataUsage.intro: When you generate images using Mockup Machine:
items: Your uploaded images and prompts are sent to Google's Gemini API for processing
Image data is transmitted securely to Google Cloud infrastructure
Google may use this data in accordance with their Privacy Policy and Terms of Service
Generated images are returned to Mockup Machine and stored according to our Privacy Policy
We do not control how Google uses or stores data sent through their API
dataUsage.note: For details on data handling, please review both our Privacy Policy and Google's AI Services Privacy Policy.

rateLimits.title: 5. Rate Limits and Quotas
rateLimits.intro: Image generation is subject to rate limits imposed by:
items: Mockup Machine rate limits: Based on your subscription tier and credit balance
Google API rate limits: Imposed by Google Cloud on API usage
Exceeding rate limits may result in temporary service unavailability
Rate limits may vary based on current API load and Google's policies
We reserve the right to implement additional rate limiting to ensure fair access

creditCosts.title: 6.1 Credit Costs
items: Mockup Machine¬Æ HD: 1 credit per image
Mockup Machine¬Æ 4K: 3-7 credits per image (varies by selected resolution)
Credit costs are set by Mockup Machine and may change with notice
Credits are consumed upon successful generation, not upon request

inputRequirements.title: 6.2 Input Requirements
items: Supported image formats: PNG, JPG, WEBP
Maximum file size: 10MB per image
Prompt length limitations may apply
4K model supports up to 3 reference images simultaneously

outputFormats.title: 6.3 Output Formats
items: Generated images are provided in PNG format
Output resolution varies by selected model and settings
Actual dimensions may vary slightly from requested aspect ratios

userResponsibilities.title: 7. User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.intro: When using Mockup Machine's AI-powered features, you agree to:
items: Use generated content in compliance with applicable laws and regulations
Respect intellectual property rights of others
Not use the service to generate harmful, illegal, or inappropriate content
Understand that AI-generated content may contain errors or unexpected results
Review generated images before using them in commercial projects
Comply with Google's Acceptable Use Policy for their AI services

serviceAvailability.title: 8. Service Availability
items: Google Cloud API availability and operational status
Network connectivity between our servers and Google's infrastructure
Google's API rate limits and quotas
Our own infrastructure status
serviceAvailability.note: We cannot guarantee uninterrupted service, as it is partially dependent on third-party infrastructure. Service outages, maintenance, or API changes by Google may temporarily affect availability. We will make reasonable efforts to communicate any known issues.

modelChanges.title: 9. Model Changes and Updates
modelChanges.intro: Google may update, modify, or deprecate their Gemini models at any time. Mockup Machine reserves the right to:
items: Update which Google models are used for each tier
Migrate to newer model versions as they become available
Adjust pricing and credit costs if Google's pricing changes
Modify features or capabilities based on model updates
Provide reasonable notice of significant changes when possible

contentPolicies.title: 10. Content Policies
contentPolicies.intro: Both Mockup Machine and Google have content policies that restrict:
items: Generation of illegal content
Generation of harmful or abusive content
Generation of content that violates intellectual property rights
Attempts to circumvent safety filters or content policies
contentPolicies.note: Requests that violate these policies will be rejected. Repeated violations may result in account suspension or termination.

disclaimers.title: 11. Disclaimers
items: AI-generated content may contain errors, inaccuracies, or unexpected results
We do not guarantee that generated images will meet your specific requirements
Model capabilities and limitations are determined by Google, not Mockup Machine
Service quality and availability depend on third-party infrastructure
Google may modify, deprecate, or change their models without notice

contact.title: 12. Contact
contact.support: For questions about this Usage Policy or technical details: contato@visant.co

sections.agreement: By using Mockup Machine, you acknowledge that you have read and understand this Usage Policy, including the disclosure that the service uses Google Gemini AI models for image generation.
